import React from "react"; export default function PizzaBlock({ title, prise, imageUrl, sizes, types }) { const typeNames = ['тоненька', 'традиційна']; const [activeType, setActiveType] = React.useState(0); const [activeSize, setActiveSize] = React.useState(0); return (

{title}

    {types.map(type =>
  • setActiveType(type)} className={activeType === type ? 'active' : ''} >{typeNames[type]}
    • )}
    {sizes.map((size, i) =>
  • setActiveSize(i)} className={activeSize === i ? 'active' : ''}>{size} см.
    • )}
від {prise} ₴
) }
